project.description: Watches for changes in the I18n resource bundle Git repository. When triggered, detects which files have changed and copies/replaces those files to the target server.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash # Detect changed files in last commit CHANGED_FILES=$(git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep '.properties') echo "Changed files: $CHANGED_FILES"
# Copy changed files to the server (edit 'TARGET_DIR' and copy command as needed) TARGET_DIR=/path/to/your/target/server/resources for file in $CHANGED_FILES; do echo "Copying $file to $TARGET_DIR" cp "$file" "$TARGET_DIR/" # If remote, use: scp "$file" user@server:$TARGET_DIR/ done
